metadata.title: CVE-2018-19516 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
messagepartthemes/default/defaultrenderer.cpp in messagelib in KDEApplications before 18.12.0 does not properly restrict the handling of anhttp-equiv="REFRESH" value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kf5-messagelib-data - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5messagecomposer5abi2 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5messagecore5abi2 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5messagelist5abi1 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5messageviewer-plugins - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5messageviewer5abi5 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5mimetreeparser5abi3 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5templateparser5abi2 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
libkf5webengineviewer5abi3 - 4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kf5-messagelib package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:22.08.1-0ubuntu1').
